trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lenoir City
There were no other sightings in Lenoir City on or around February 6th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very large object with orange lights arranged in a V shape @ 1500' alt. and moving east to west.
divs: sighting detailsi was traveling south on watts rd. and upon approaching the traffic light at kingston pike, i noticed in front of me a very large object with orange lights arranged in a v shape. the object was moving from east to west at about 1500' and decreasing in altitude. i watched the object for no more than 10 seconds until it went behind a 1000' hill that was about 2 miles from my vantage point. the object was moving at about the speed an aircraft would travel when landing. i never saw it go back up and there is absolutly no place to land in the area where i lost sight of the craft. i would estimate the object was 8 miles east of lenior city, tn when i lost sight. below is a link to a map of the area. http:\\maps.google.com\maps?hl=en&ie=utf8&ll=35.803614,-84.148064&spn=0.210504,0.363922&t=p&z=12
